markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Goblin Warrior](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3024)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

The frontline fighters of goblin tribes prefer to fight in large groups— especially when they can outnumber their foes at least three to one.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)): DC 13

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 8
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Goblin_Warrior.webp" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature -1">[Goblin Warrior](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3024)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Goblin" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=618" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=628" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 174 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +2; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Goblin](/Languages.aspx?ID=6)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +5, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +2, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +1, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +5

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +0

**Dex** +3

**Con** +1

**Int** +0

**Wis** -1

**Cha** +1
</row>

**Items**
[Dogslicer](/Weapons.aspx?ID=405), [Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4), [Shortbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=77) (10 arrows)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 16 

**Fort** +5 

**Ref** +7 

**Will** +3 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 6

</row>

**Goblin Scuttle** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** A goblin ally ends a move action adjacent to the warrior; **Effect** The goblin warrior Steps.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dogslicer +7 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Backstabber](/Traits.aspx?ID=172), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d6 slashing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
shortbow +7 ([deadly d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 0](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 1d6 piercing

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-422" />
name: Goblin Warrior
